name: Your Shape®: Fitness Evolved 2013
description: With 125 different workouts including strength building, cardio training, dancing, yoga, and more... Your Shape: Fitness Evolved 2013 is on the leading-edge of fitness products. By connecting to the Your Shape Center, you’ll join the fitness community to challenge your friends, share your recent achievements, check out your personal stats and status, and participate in community events. Thanks to the Wii U™ GamePad, create your personalized fitness program and share your progress with the community.
